    <article class="markdown-body entry-content" itemprop="text"><table data-table-type="yaml-metadata">
  <thead>
  <tr>
  <th>title</th>

  <th>output</th>
  </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
  <tr>
  <td><div>Examples of Uk5</div></td>

  <td><div>html_document</div></td>
  </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>

<p>In this document, I will look at all the examples who have maximal loading on Uk4 and Uk5. Recall their eigenvector and proportion of hierarchical weight:</p>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-r"><pre><span class="pl-v">covmat</span><span class="pl-k">=</span>readRDS(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>../Data/covmatAug13withED.rds<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)
<span class="pl-v">pis</span><span class="pl-k">=</span>readRDS(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>../Data/pisAug13withED.rds<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)<span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">pihat</span>
<span class="pl-v">z.stat</span><span class="pl-k">=</span>read.table(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>../Data/maxz.txt<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)
<span class="pl-c1">pi</span><span class="pl-v">.mat</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-k">matrix</span>(<span class="pl-smi">pis</span>,<span class="pl-v">ncol</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-c1">54</span>,<span class="pl-v">byrow</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-c1">T</span>)
<span class="pl-v">lfsr</span><span class="pl-k">=</span>read.table(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>../Data/Aug13withEDlfsr.txt<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)[,<span class="pl-k">-</span><span class="pl-c1">1</span>]
<span class="pl-c">#post.weights=read.table("~/Dropbox/Aug12/Aug13withEDpost.weights.txt")[,-1]</span>
<span class="pl-v">posterior.means</span><span class="pl-k">=</span>read.table(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>../Data/Aug13withEDposterior.means.txt<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)[,<span class="pl-k">-</span><span class="pl-c1">1</span>]
colnames(<span class="pl-smi">posterior.means</span>)<span class="pl-k">=</span>colnames(<span class="pl-smi">lfsr</span>)<span class="pl-k">=</span>colnames(<span class="pl-smi">z.stat</span>)


<span class="pl-v">abr.names</span><span class="pl-k">=</span>as.character(read.table(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>../Data/abbreviate.names.txt<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)[,<span class="pl-c1">2</span>])
<span class="pl-v">newfunc</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-k">function</span>(<span class="pl-smi">t</span>){
  par(<span class="pl-v">mfrow</span><span class="pl-k">=</span>c(<span class="pl-c1">1</span>,<span class="pl-c1">2</span>))
  <span class="pl-v">name</span><span class="pl-k">=</span>strsplit(rownames(<span class="pl-smi">z.stat</span>)[<span class="pl-smi">t</span>], <span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>[.]<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)[[<span class="pl-c1">1</span>]][<span class="pl-c1">1</span>]
  <span class="pl-v">x.min</span><span class="pl-k">=</span>min(as.numeric(<span class="pl-smi">z.stat</span>[<span class="pl-smi">t</span>,]),as.numeric(<span class="pl-smi">posterior.means</span>[<span class="pl-smi">t</span>,]))
  <span class="pl-v">x.max</span><span class="pl-k">=</span>max(as.numeric(<span class="pl-smi">z.stat</span>[<span class="pl-smi">t</span>,]),as.numeric(<span class="pl-smi">posterior.means</span>[<span class="pl-smi">t</span>,]))
<span class="pl-v">a</span><span class="pl-k">=</span>barplot(as.numeric(<span class="pl-smi">z.stat</span>[<span class="pl-smi">t</span>,]),<span class="pl-v">xlab</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>,<span class="pl-v">las</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-c1">2</span>,<span class="pl-v">cex.names</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-c1">0.5</span>,<span class="pl-v">names</span><span class="pl-k">=</span>colnames(<span class="pl-smi">z.stat</span>),
<span class="pl-v">ylim</span><span class="pl-k">=</span>c(<span class="pl-smi">x.min</span>,<span class="pl-smi">x.max</span>))
title(<span class="pl-v">main</span><span class="pl-k">=</span>paste0(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Z Statistic<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>),<span class="pl-v">font.main</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-c1">1</span>,<span class="pl-v">col.main</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>blue<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)
mtext(paste0(<span class="pl-smi">name</span>),<span class="pl-v">col</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>purple<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)
<span class="pl-v">b</span><span class="pl-k">=</span>barplot(as.numeric(<span class="pl-smi">posterior.means</span>[<span class="pl-smi">t</span>,]),<span class="pl-v">col</span><span class="pl-k">=</span>col.func(<span class="pl-smi">t</span>,<span class="pl-v">lfsr</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-smi">lfsr</span>,<span class="pl-v">posterior.means</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-smi">posterior.means</span>),<span class="pl-v">xlab</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span><span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>,<span class="pl-v">cex.names</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-c1">0.5</span>,<span class="pl-v">las</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-c1">2</span>,<span class="pl-v">ylab</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>E(B|Data)/s.j<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>,<span class="pl-v">ylim</span><span class="pl-k">=</span>c(<span class="pl-smi">x.min</span>,<span class="pl-smi">x.max</span>),<span class="pl-v">names</span><span class="pl-k">=</span>colnames(<span class="pl-smi">posterior.means</span>))
title(<span class="pl-v">main</span><span class="pl-k">=</span>paste0(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>E(B|Data)/s.j<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>),<span class="pl-v">font.main</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-c1">1</span>,<span class="pl-v">col.main</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>blue<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)
mtext(paste0(<span class="pl-smi">name</span>),<span class="pl-v">col</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>purple<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)
}

<span class="pl-v">col.func</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-k">function</span>(<span class="pl-smi">lfsr</span>,<span class="pl-smi">posterior.means</span>,<span class="pl-smi">j</span>){
  <span class="pl-v">R</span><span class="pl-k">=</span>ncol(<span class="pl-smi">posterior.means</span>)
  <span class="pl-v">lfsr.mat</span><span class="pl-k">=</span>as.matrix(<span class="pl-smi">lfsr</span>)
  <span class="pl-v">col.mat</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-c1">NULL</span>
  <span class="pl-k">for</span>(<span class="pl-smi">r</span> <span class="pl-k">in</span> <span class="pl-c1">1</span><span class="pl-k">:</span><span class="pl-smi">R</span>){
 <span class="pl-k">if</span> (<span class="pl-smi">lfsr.mat</span>[<span class="pl-smi">j</span>,<span class="pl-smi">r</span>]<span class="pl-k">&lt;</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-c1">0.05</span>) {
      <span class="pl-smi">col.mat</span>[<span class="pl-smi">r</span>]<span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>green<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>
    } <span class="pl-k">else</span> <span class="pl-k">if</span> (<span class="pl-smi">lfsr.mat</span>[<span class="pl-smi">j</span>,<span class="pl-smi">r</span>]<span class="pl-k">&lt;</span><span class="pl-c1">0.5</span>) {
      <span class="pl-smi">col.mat</span>[<span class="pl-smi">r</span>]<span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>orange<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>
    } <span class="pl-k">else</span> <span class="pl-k">if</span> (<span class="pl-smi">lfsr.mat</span>[<span class="pl-smi">j</span>,<span class="pl-smi">r</span>]<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-c1">0.50</span>) {
      <span class="pl-smi">col.mat</span>[<span class="pl-smi">r</span>]<span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>red<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>
    } 
  }
  <span class="pl-k">return</span>(<span class="pl-smi">col.mat</span>)
}


library(<span class="pl-smi">gplots</span>)
library(<span class="pl-smi">ggplot2</span>)

<span class="pl-v">cols</span><span class="pl-k">=</span>read.table(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>../Data/maxColsums.txt<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)[,<span class="pl-c1">1</span>]
<span class="pl-v">rows</span><span class="pl-k">=</span>read.table(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>../Data/maxrowsums.txt<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>)[,<span class="pl-c1">1</span>]</pre></div>

<p>I generated a list of associations who have maximal posterior weight at each component:</p>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-r"><pre><span class="pl-v">c</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-c1">NULL</span>
<span class="pl-v">r</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-c1">NULL</span>
<span class="pl-k">for</span>(<span class="pl-smi">i</span> <span class="pl-k">in</span> <span class="pl-c1">1</span><span class="pl-k">:</span>nrow(<span class="pl-smi">post.weights</span>)){
  <span class="pl-v">pw.mat</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-k">matrix</span>(as.matrix(<span class="pl-smi">post.weights</span>[<span class="pl-smi">i</span>,]),<span class="pl-v">ncol</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-c1">54</span>,<span class="pl-v">byrow</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-c1">T</span>)
  <span class="pl-smi">c</span>[<span class="pl-smi">i</span>]<span class="pl-k">=</span>which.max(colSums(<span class="pl-smi">pw.mat</span>))
  <span class="pl-smi">r</span>[<span class="pl-smi">i</span>]<span class="pl-k">=</span>which.max(rowSums(<span class="pl-smi">pw.mat</span>))
  }

write.table(<span class="pl-smi">c</span>,<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>../Data/maxColsums.txt<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>,<span class="pl-v">row.names</span><span class="pl-k">=</span>rownames(<span class="pl-smi">z.stat</span>))
write.table(<span class="pl-smi">r</span>,<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>../Data/maxrowsums.txt<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>,<span class="pl-v">row.names</span><span class="pl-k">=</span>rownames(<span class="pl-smi">z.stat</span>))  
})</pre></div>

<p>Then I got a list of those that have maximum weighting at component 4 or 5:</p>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-r"><pre><span class="pl-v">uk5list</span><span class="pl-k">=</span>which(<span class="pl-smi">cols</span><span class="pl-k">==</span><span class="pl-c1">5</span>)</pre></div>

<p>Here's I plot eigenvector 5, and the sum of the hierarchical weight at that component is: <code>r round(colSums(pi.mat)[5],2)</code></p>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-r"><pre><span class="pl-v">k</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-c1">5</span>

  <span class="pl-v">x</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-smi">covmat</span>[[<span class="pl-smi">k</span>]]<span class="pl-k">/</span>max(diag(<span class="pl-smi">covmat</span>[[<span class="pl-smi">k</span>]]))
colnames(<span class="pl-smi">x</span>)<span class="pl-k">=</span>colnames(<span class="pl-smi">z.stat</span>)
  rownames(<span class="pl-smi">x</span>)<span class="pl-k">=</span>colnames(<span class="pl-smi">z.stat</span>)                  
<span class="pl-c"># heatmap.2(x,Rowv=FALSE,Colv=FALSE,symm=TRUE,dendrogram="none",density="none",trace="none",col=redblue(256),main=paste0("HeatMapofNormalizedUk",k),cexRow=0.5,cexCol=0.5,symkey=T,symbreaks=T)</span>
<span class="pl-v">v</span><span class="pl-k">=</span>svd(<span class="pl-smi">x</span>)<span class="pl-k">$</span><span class="pl-smi">v</span>

rownames(<span class="pl-smi">v</span>)<span class="pl-k">=</span>colnames(<span class="pl-smi">v</span>)<span class="pl-k">=</span>as.matrix(<span class="pl-smi">abr.names</span>)
par(<span class="pl-v">mar</span><span class="pl-k">=</span>c(<span class="pl-c1">8</span>,<span class="pl-c1">4.1</span>,<span class="pl-c1">4.1</span>,<span class="pl-c1">2.1</span>))
barplot(<span class="pl-smi">v</span>[,<span class="pl-c1">1</span>]<span class="pl-k">*</span>sign(<span class="pl-smi">v</span>[which.max(abs(<span class="pl-smi">v</span>[,<span class="pl-c1">1</span>])),<span class="pl-c1">1</span>]),<span class="pl-v">las</span><span class="pl-k">=</span><span class="pl-c1">2</span>,<span class="pl-v">main</span><span class="pl-k">=</span>paste(<span class="pl-s"><span class="pl-pds">"</span>Eigenvector 1 of Uk<span class="pl-pds">"</span></span>,<span class="pl-smi">k</span>,round(colSums(<span class="pl-c1">pi</span><span class="pl-smi">.mat</span>),<span class="pl-c1">2</span>)[<span class="pl-smi">k</span>]),<span class="pl-v">cex.names</span> <span class="pl-k">=</span> <span class="pl-c1">0.5</span>)
</pre></div>

<p>Here I plot all the Uk5s:</p>

<div class="highlight highlight-source-r"><pre><span class="pl-k">for</span>(<span class="pl-smi">j</span> <span class="pl-k">in</span> <span class="pl-smi">uk5list</span>){
  newfunc(<span class="pl-smi">j</span>)
}</pre></div>
</article>
